HI! I'M LINH NEO

FILM PRODUCER

Nhà làm phim mang đến những câu chuyện hấp dẫn và mang đến những trải nghiệm hình ảnh đáng nhớ!

My Story
Linh
Neo

GIỚI THIỆU

LINH NEO - NGUYỄN NGỌC LINH

Born and raised in London, Nolan developed an interest in filmmaking from a young age. After studying English literature at University College London, he made his feature debut with Following (1998). Nolan gained international recognition with his second film, Memento (2000), for which he was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Original Screenplay. Nolan's films are typically rooted in epistemological and metaphysical themes, exploring human morality, the construction of time, and the malleable nature of memory and personal identity.
